carRental.title: Car Rental
carRental.description: We offer a wide range of vehicles to meet all your needs, from economical compact cars to luxury SUVs.

maintenance.title: Maintenance & Repair
maintenance.description: Our experts take care of your vehicle with regular maintenance services and quick repairs.

assistance.title: 24/7 Assistance
assistance.description: We support you on the road with assistance available 24/7 in case of breakdown or emergency.

cleaning.title: Professional Cleaning
cleaning.description: Interior and exterior cleaning service for a spotless vehicle.
